org.erasmusmc.utilities

Class FileShuffler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.erasmusmc.utilities.FileShuffler

  • public class FileShuffler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for shuffling (i.e. put in random order) comma separated value text files.
    Author:
    schuemie

    • Field Detail

      • chunckSize

        public static int chunckSize
        Chunksize is the number of rows shuffled in memory in one time. Higher chunk size leads to better performance but requires more memory. Set chunksize to -1 to let the system determine the largest chunk size based on available memory.

      • verbose

        public static boolean verbose

      • maxNumberOfTempFiles
